3pYTHW87YqCk.code:
await initHydra()
let pattern = "3 4 5 6 7 6 [2 5]*1 1 9 4 5"
noise(18)
.colorama(1)
.posterize(2)
.kaleid(50)
.mask(
shape(H(pattern), 0.25).modulateScale(
noise(400.5, 0.5)
)
)
.mask(shape(400, 1, 2.125))
.modulateScale(osc(6, 0.125, 0.05).kaleid(50))
.mult(osc(20, 0.05, 2.4).kaleid(50), 0.25)
.scale(1.75, 0.65, 0.5)
.modulate(noise(0.5))
.saturate(6)
.posterize(4, 0.2)
.scale(1.5)
.out();
n(pattern).scale("G:mixolydian").sound("ocarina_small").room(1)
